content.text: Velvét challenges the outdated seasonal calendar with luxury clothing designed for year-round wear. Spearheaded by founder Ritvik Sharma, the brand’s latest collection embodies timeless versatility, offering pieces that effortlessly transition from summer soirées to winter galas.
Why All-Season Luxury is the Future

By combining breathable wools, temperature-regulating silks, and expertly crafted layering pieces, Sharma offers customers true versatility. 'Our clients no longer want wardrobes dictated by seasons — they want pieces that feel relevant 365 days a year,' he explains. The result is a collection where every garment serves as a building block for multiple climates and occasions.

Global icons are already embracing this timeless approach — reshaping how fashion fits into modern lives. Celebrities like Deepika Padukone and Timothée Chalamet have been spotted wearing Velvét's modular ensembles, affirming the brand's place at the cutting edge of luxury fashion.

Sharma emphasizes that Velvét's all-season ethos is as much about sustainability as it is about style. 'By creating pieces that are not bound by seasonal obsolescence, we reduce waste and encourage mindful consumption,' he notes. Fabrics are sourced from eco-certified mills in Italy and India, ensuring both ethical provenance and superior performance in diverse weather conditions.

Every jacket is lined with moisture-wicking bamboo silk, while trousers are tailored from lightweight Merino wool blends that stay cool in heat and warm in cold. These innovations allow Velvét to deliver the luxurious feel clients expect, without compromising on practicality or planet-friendliness.
A New Luxury Uniform for the Global Citizen

With clients spanning from New York financiers to Mumbai creatives, Velvét's designs cater to a new generation of global citizens. 'Our pieces are meant for those who traverse cities and climates in a single week — they need wardrobes that adapt as quickly as they do,' says Sharma.

This philosophy has also influenced the brand's upcoming collaborations with luxury hotels and airlines, aiming to redefine travel wardrobes. Sharma hints at a limited capsule collection designed specifically for long-haul comfort without sacrificing elegance.
Looking Ahead: Beyond Seasons, Beyond Fashion

As Velvét continues its meteoric rise, Sharma envisions the brand’s all-season concept expanding into accessories, outerwear, and even home textiles. 'Our mission is to make seasonless luxury a lifestyle, not just a wardrobe choice,' he asserts.
With plans to unveil a flagship store in Dubai that embodies this global, seasonless vision, Velvét is poised to reshape not only how we dress, but how we define modern luxury itself.
